sentence.text: Whilst the lion cub 's mother can hunt for what she needs , your kitten depends on you .
` I was attracted to running because it is a sport where you depend only on yourself to achieve something and from the start I just wanted to enjoy it , not to beat others .
As Donnison says , ` The crucial needs arise from an unavoidable responsibility for caring for someone who depends on you " ; as Fairbairn says , ` Dependency is the key to women 's oppression .
If any doctor had depended on us for his living , then he would have died in penury .
She depended on me for company ; I was a better companion than Colonel Goreng .
We are now facing the most serious challenge in our history and depend on you for support .
Not all class members can attend rallies etc , they , and the Society , depend on you to keep them up to date with the latest stock .
Producers depend on us to buy their goods .
Any industry , whether public or private , depends for its success on markets .
We depend upon others for this kind of social education throughout life .

Successful conservation may well imply a cutback in commercial crops and therefore a reduction in foreign exchange on which the state elite depends for its imported luxuries , foreign travel and education .
The carpet industry is , however , one of Nepal 's largest employers , with some 250,000 people depending on it for work .
Many parents dread the thought of having to depend on their children .
Instead , they depend on others to do , while they see to resources , mind details of coordination , keep track of morale and so on .
Whatever the outcome , T & L has no wish to be perceived as depending heavily on one product , having spent the past decade , in Shaw 's words , ` building a broader base " .
No manager can depend solely on information generated internally in the organization ; external information , often unpredictable in occurrence or impact , is critical .
Prayer becomes a constant relating to God throughout our daily lives , as we depend on him in trust and love .
Even with the advantages of other income sources , studios depend on a few hits to pay for a large number of duds .
But Britain 's disabled athletes more often have to depend on events like this disco to pay their fare .
Gould grew to depend on the Aborigines ' local knowledge to find birds that were new to the Western world and to learn about their habits .
However , he allowed the Gulf regimes to depend on the infidels in attacking Saddam Hussein .
